snippet: Lar Lubovitch presented a premiere based on a Picasso painting to a Debussy score, along with recent works set to Schumann and a takeoff on Liszt.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews concert of dance works, including premiere of Lar Lubovitch piece Transparent Things, performed by Lar Lubovitch Dance Company at Gould Hall.
lead_paragraph: Lar Lubovitch presented a premiere based on a Picasso painting to a Debussy score, along with recent works set to Schumann and a takeoff on Liszt.

headline.seo: Lar Lubovitch Dance at Gould Hall
headline.main: Conversations With Picasso and Some Dead Composers
headline.print_headline: Conversations With Picasso And Some Dead Composers
